channel.title: Module bundlers on Learn with AI
channel.description: Recent content in Module bundlers on Learn with AI

item.description: Preview User ask: give me five question about Webpack ChatGPT answer: What is Webpack and what are its primary features? How does Webpack handle dependencies and module bundling? What is the difference between entry and output in Webpack configuration? How can Webpack be configured to handle CSS and other asset files? What are the benefits of using Webpack in a web application development project? Explain User ask: Explain Webpack and give an example ChatGPT answer:
